author: franzoni
body:
- as the command says, restore consistency internally to VtxSmeared.py
- RealisticHI2011Collision is the beamspot for run2, as per HIN convenor @inugent
- agreed with @yetkinyilmaz that RealisticHI2011Collision needs to be put back, see #6982
title: put back RealisticHI2011Collision
